trans-unit.source: You can create virtual machines (VMs) in Azure and attach multiple network interfaces (NICs) to each of your VMs.
trans-unit.target: You can create virtual machines (VMs) in Azure and attach multiple network interfaces (NICs) to each of your VMs.

trans-unit.source: Multi NIC is a requirement for many network virtual appliances, such as application delivery and WAN optimization solutions.
trans-unit.target: Multi NIC is a requirement for many network virtual appliances, such as application delivery and WAN optimization solutions.

trans-unit.source: Multi NIC also provides more network traffic management functionality, including isolation of traffic between a front end NIC and back end NIC(s), or separation of data plane traffic from management plane traffic.
trans-unit.target: Multi NIC also provides more network traffic management functionality, including isolation of traffic between a front end NIC and back end NIC(s), or separation of data plane traffic from management plane traffic.

trans-unit.source: Before you can implement multi NICs in VMs, it is necessary to understand when you can use multi NICs, and how they are used.
trans-unit.target: Before you can implement multi NICs in VMs, it is necessary to understand when you can use multi NICs, and how they are used.

trans-unit.source: Read the [multi NIC overview](virtual-networks-multiple-nics.md) to learn more about VMs with multiple NICs.
trans-unit.target: Read the [multi NIC overview](virtual-networks-multiple-nics.md) to learn more about VMs with multiple NICs.
